text: Bhala uha kauna hai jisane akasam ate dharati nu paida kita ate tuhade la'i akasam vicom minha varasa'i'a phira asi usa tom hare bhare baga paida kite. Tuhade vasa vica nahim si ki tusim unham rukham nu uga sakade. Ki alaha de barabara ko'i hora pujanayoga hai. (Nahim) sagom iha raha tom bhatakana vale loka hana
